package.name: BackgrounderAction for CCSupport
package.shortDescription: Add "Toggle Background Mode" action to ControlCenter

descriptionlist.description: Introducing " BackgrounderAction for CCSupport " that can enhance the background operation

However, with " Backgrounder Action for CCSupport ", it is possible to continue the same operation as the foreground in the background even if the application is closed ! This operation can be turned on and off from the toggle of the control center .

changelog.change: Add CC toggle in the setting
